title: The Phoenix Flavor - Zediious Sprinkles
description:
1500+ mod and 1000+ plugin list, patched extensively and providing an all around modern gaming experience in Skyrim.


Serio ENB or Ominous ENB

Massively Overhauled and Modern Combat

Various New and Reworked Mechanics

New and Improved Quests, Locations, and Creatures

Complete Settlement Overhaul with every settlement covered

Custom Armor/Weapon leveled lists utilizing a very large amount of mod-added equipment


And much more! Check the Wiki to see a full list of notable mods!
author: Zediious
